Sentencas: The feasibility of employing lignite coal as a fuel in a Direct Carbon Fuel Cell (DCFC) of the type: lignite vertical bar Co-CeO2/YSZ/Aglair is investigated.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The impact of several parameters, related to anodic electrode composition (20, 40 and 60 wt.% Co/CeO2), cell temperature (700-800 degrees C), carrier gas composition (CO2/He mixtures), and total feed flow rate (10-70 cm(3)/min), was systematically examined.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effect of molten carbonates on DCFC performance was also investigated by employing a eutectic mixture of lithium and potassium carbonates as carbon additives.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the absence of carbonates, the optimum performance (similar to 10 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C), was achieved by employing 20 wt.% Co/CeO2 as anodic electrode and pure CO2 as purging gas.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An inferior behavior was demonstrated by utilizing He instead of CO2 atmosphere in anode compartment and by increasing purging gas flow rate.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Carbonates infusion into lignite feedstock resulted in a further increase of maximum power density up to 32%.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The obtained findings are discussed based also on AC impedance spectroscopy measurements, which revealed the impact of DCFC operating parameters on both ohmic and electrode resistances.
Titulo: Direct utilization of lignite coal in a Co-CeO2/YSZ/Ag solid oxide fuel cell
